title: Kikoeta Koi No Byoushinon
alternative_title: Kikoeta Koi no Byoushinon ; The Second Hand Ticks With the Sound of Love ; きこえた恋の秒針音 ; 再次响起的恋爱秒针音
status: Kikoeta Koi no Byoushinon ; The Second Hand Ticks With the Sound of Love ; きこえた恋の秒針音 ; 再次响起的恋爱秒针音
description:
Description :
        You're too clingy. I only saw you as a friend with benefits. With that cruel line and a broken watch, Yudai broke up horribly with Chiaki seven years ago. Unable to forget him even though he pushed him away himself, Yudai keeps Chiaki's watch with care. One day, the two meet again... The time that had stopped starts moving again, together with their lonely hearts.+
